column4: Does anyone here know how to properly install this theme on Ubuntu? It doesn't want to work http://danrabbit.deviantart.com/art/eGTK-83104033
dl the zip file, extract to where you downloaded it, then drag the tar.gz to the theme manager
just drag the tar.gz
But the theme still does not show up .....
it asked me if I wanted to enable it
and did it work? ;-)
yep
not sure what the deb is for, will investigate , perhaps the readme has some clues :)
it does not work here for me.
same thing here, dragging it and installing it and no change, then reverting to another and re-dragging (and getting an error) installed  it
the egtk one?
yes thats the one
I got it from gnome-look iirc, it works fine
took two tries to install though
unzip, grab tar.gz to theme manager, it will ask if you want to install choose yes
thats exactly how I did it.
I got a no install the first time, clicked another theme, then tried again, and it gave an error but worked (oddly enough)
is there anything ELSE that needs to be installed for the GTK themes to work??
it worked for me, but I had to drag it twice for some odd reason

Now here's a weird thing - I install the theme, it doesn't show up in the theme selector BUT when i go customize I can select the individual bits and pieces with no problem.... but as a custom theme not as a "theme" selectable in the selector .... what is missing???
seems it is oddly written theme, but all the bits and pieces are fairly nice
If you have a suggestion for something even more slick than this - let me know.
gnome-look.org highest rated has the most
